post.text: The Rachel Maddow Show walks through some of the best moments of Hillary's spectacular foreign policy speech: "She is not caricaturing Donald Trump...she's just quoting him directly, and that's deadly."

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: Please please do political ads of what a Donald Trump America would look like, I know a lot of Hispanics we could act like the families being deported. I think it's important to show the American public what the country would look like if he wins.

replies.author: Brendan
replies.text: He has a really good brain! He will make america white again..
